actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 32 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for interest payments on amounts contributed by members of the Armed Forces to Post-Vietnam Era Veterans Education Accounts and to authorize transferability of entitlement to educational assistance from an eligible veteran to the veteran's spouse or child.
short_title: Veterans Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1983

summary.text: Veterans' Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1983 - Amends the Post-Vietnam Era Veterans Educational Assistance Program to require the Secretary of Defense to pay interest on the amounts contributed by a member of the armed forces to the Post- Vietnam Era Veterans Education Account. Permits a participant to transfer all or part of such participant's entitlement to such assistance to one or more dependents.

titles.title: Veterans Educational Assistance Program Amendments of 1983

A bill to amend chapter 32 of title 38, United States Code, to provide for interest payments on amounts contributed by members of the Armed Forces to Post-Vietnam Era Veterans Education Accounts and to authorize transferability of entitlement to educational assistance from an eligible veteran to the veteran's spouse or child.
